title: Serious 5's Teams and Duo Queuer Required
body:
Looking to start a serious 5's team with a mature and friendly bunch of persons preferably aged 23+ (or at least mature and intelligent enough to appear to be of said age :P) with the intentions of climbing and upskilling. Current ELO not as relevant for those who obtain outstanding game knowledge and skills in theory crafting, but preferable skill level being GOLD 3 - PLAT.

Mechanical competence is required but is something that can be developed on an individual basis, I am more interested in peoples ability to think strategically and offer insight into how to overcome shortcomings by accepting responsibilities for failures so that they can be learnt from.  

The idea is to provide an vehicle to higher elos for those who desire an environment in which they can experiment with strategies and learn from people who aren't yelling profanities at each other. 

Message me if this sounds like an idea you may be interested in ~

Also, any SUPPORT / ADC mains who require a DUO partner GOLD 3 - PLAT please give me a buzz

replies.body: Silver 2 Korean support wanting to carry you to Challenger.
I will send you a message tonight, I operate on NZ time and am available from 6:30pm - 11pm Weekdays, and anytime weekends - I'll flick you an invite tonight

I would very much be interested. I am currently GOLD 5. I have been thinking about looking for a team to join for a while, but never seemed to actually do it. I understand that my game play is not perfect, and would appreciate a team to help myself improve. I currently main support (or at least that is what I find most enjoyable and try to get it in solo queue), with my second best being adc/top, then jungle, then mid. I feel that I have reasonably good strategical thinking, as well as map awareness. If you feel like a might be a person that could fit into your team, add me in game.
